tier.item: (9) Agreement verbs and plain verbs in DGS
a. arzt px mann py x helfy
Agreement verbs and plain verbs in DGS

The doctor is helping the man
S/he is giving him/her a flower

`The doctor and the man are helping each other'

tier.item: `The doctor is helping the man and (then) the man is helping the doctor'
The doctor is helping the man and (then) the man is helping the doctor
a. *arzt px mann py x helf y helfx
`The doctor is helping the man and the man is not helping the doctor'
*arzt px mann py x helf y helfx
The doctor is helping the man and the man is not helping the doctor

(14) Sequential conversion is ungrammatical with one-handed AVs

Simultaneous conversion is ungrammatical with two-handed AVs

Ident(F) excludes conversion with plain verbs
